theClub: girlname giggles: But we've already been to the club, silly!
You and girlname enter the Night Club.
You are with girlname in the Night Club.
You head out to the dancefloor to cut up the rug.

leaveDance: You pull girlname off the dancefloor.
darkClubEnter: You and girlname enter the nightclub. It's dark and deserted.
darkClubBe: You are with girlname in the closed nightclub.
emerBreak: girlname practically runs to the toilets through the dark room. Leaving you alone in the doorway.
As you imagine her rushing into a stall, desperately squirming, you close the door behind you.
emerHold: You and girlname enter the club. She's openly squirming and you can't help but stare.
photoGameConvince: You: I know you really need to go, but can I take just a couple of snapshots first?

photoGameStart: You motion girlname up onto the nightclub stage.
She carefully ascends the stairs, and you find a switch that turns on some stage lights.

midPhotoGame.common: You're taking snapshots of girlname up on the nightclub stage.

barGirlDesc: The girl tending the bar is really good-looking.
You can't help but notice how good the bartender looks in her uniform.
The bar girl seems to be smiling at you, and she looks pretty hot.
The gorgeous bartender keeps stealing glances at you - you wonder if she's trying to tell you something.
The bar girl leans over the bar giving you an eyeful down her shirt.
The bar girl bites her lip as she locks eyes with you.
barGirlQuotes: BarGirl: It's pretty crowded tonight, isn't it?
BarGirl: Wow! Have you seen the line for the restrooms tonight?
BarGirl: Anything else I can do for you?
BarGirl: Man it's hot in here, isn't it?
BarGirl: Hey, handsome, did you come here alone?
barGirlFlirt: YOU: Wow, that outfit looks so good on you! Where'd you get it?
YOU: Hey! Haven't I seen you before somewhere? Nope - I'd definitely remember that well.
YOU: What a busy night! When do you get off?
YOU: I'm sorry to stare - it's just that you're the most stunningly beautiful woman I've seen tonight.
YOU: Have you been working here long? I think I'd remember a beautiful face like yours.
barGirlResp: BarGirl: Thanks! I made it ... do you think it's too sexy?
BarGirl: I don't think we've met - my name's Cynthia.
BarGirl: I'm working here until closing, but I might get off sooner with a little help.
BarGirl: Gee - thanks! Do you really mean it? Look all you want!
BarGirl: Well I just started last week ... am I doing okay?
BarGirl: Well, you're not too bad looking yourself.
